alert.note: Alert for Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 06 at 2:51AM MST until March 06 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible. Storm total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Ferris, Seminoe and the Shirley Mountains. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor visibility from blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
